definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

pinyin: yi3 tai4 wang3 luo4 duan1 kou3
xun2 hui2 fen1 xi1 duan1 kou3

sentences.english: Shows how to open a port and communicate wih other computers.
sentences.chinese: 這個程序演示了打開一個端口，並和其它計算機通信。

sentences.english: The upper port of the leg protective bag of the utility model is provided with a pair of fasteners.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型護腿袋的上端口裝有一對卡子。

sentences.english: The name lookup services are not handled on this port.
sentences.chinese: 在該端口上不處理名稱查找服務。

sentences.english: Available with threaded end connections only.
sentences.chinese: 僅限於螺紋連接端口連接件。

sentences.english: Port scanners are used for network mapping and for network security assessments.
sentences.chinese: 端口掃描器是用於網絡映射和網絡安全評估。

sentences.english: You need to add virtual hosts definitions to match those ports.
sentences.chinese: 您需要添加虛擬主機定義，以匹配這些端口。

sentences.english: Use this panel to change port numbers.
sentences.chinese: 用這個頁面來改變端口號。

sentences.english: The first test shows the impact of port encryption on server performance.
sentences.chinese: 第一個測試顯示端口加密對服務器性能的影響。

sentences.english: We have only one which needs to be checked.
sentences.chinese: 我們只有一個端口需要檢查。

sentences.english: The hardware part is simple enough and uses COM and LPT port of the computer.
sentences.chinese: 硬件部分很簡單，並使用COM和並口端口的電腦。

sentences.english: Verify that the ports, or ports configured, are active and the link is up.
sentences.chinese: 確認端口或配置的端口是主動式的且鏈接已建立。

sentences.english: Verify that the ports, or ports configured, are active and the link is up.
sentences.chinese: 確認端口或配置的端口是主動式的且鏈接已建立。

sentences.english: Each of the ports on the component will be bound to the appropriate role.
sentences.chinese: 組件上的每一個端口都將被綁定到適當的角色。

sentences.english: Message listener ports have to be configured at server scope.
sentences.chinese: 消息偵聽器端口必須在服務器範圍配置。

sentences.english: This port connects to the side speakers in an 8-channel audio configuration.
sentences.chinese: 該端口連接到位於兩邊的擴音器在8聲道音頻配置。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
to access (a network)/to insert (a plug) into (a socket)
